alert.note: Alert for Adair; Linn; Macon; Mercer; Putnam; Schuyler; Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 9:22AM CDT until June 29 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 AM CDT FOR ADAIR...NORTHEASTERN LINN...SULLIVAN...NORTHEASTERN MERCER... PUTNAM...SCHUYLER AND NORTHERN MACON COUNTIES... At 921 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Unionville to 7 miles north of Novinger to 11 miles southwest of Kirksville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Kirksville, Milan, Unionville, La Plata, Lancaster, Green City, Queen City, Novinger, Greentop, Downing, Greencastle, Brashear, Glenwood, Gibbs, Millard, Pollock, Lucerne, Worthington, Elmer and Livonia. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across north central Missouri. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Linn; Macon; Mercer; Putnam; Schuyler; Sullivan
